question: Who was re-appointed as the Leader of the Rajya Sabha?
explanation: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley was once again appointed as the Leader of the Rajya Sabha (RS) following his re-election to the House. In June 2014, Mr Jaitley was appointed the leader of the House in Rajya Sabha. Prime Minister Narendra Modi is the Leader of the House in Lok Sabha. The Leader of the House is a Rajya Sabha member who is either a cabinet minister or another nominated minister.
